text: 'story highlights fbi currently investigating russian meddling us election members senate judiciary committee tried vain get information investigation cnn fbi director james comey beat back questions continuing federal probe russian interference us elections senators tried pry bit information wednesday sen richard blumenthal connecticut democrat placed target squarely president donald trump asking comey senate judiciary committee hearing investigating president part probe comey said would answer one way another cnn reporting showing trump direct subject fbi probe blumenthal later asked comey would commit explaining trump russia probe way explained clinton email investigation closed comey said would push public explanation said read '
